name: Chicken or Turkey Tetrazzini Deluxe
author: DACLKG
summary: Cooked chicken or turkey breast, pasta, veggies, sherry and broth with creamy and cheesy elements, all baked into a classic. This casserole is a great way to use leftover turkey or chicken. Delicious and freezes well too.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and set aside
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Meanwhile, melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat
Add mushrooms, onion and bell pepper and saute until tender
Stir in cream of mushroom soup and chicken broth; cook, stirring, until heated through
Stir in pasta, Cheddar cheese, peas, sherry, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper and chicken
Mix well and transfer mixture to a lightly greased 11x14 inch baking dish
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and paprika
Bake in the preheated oven for 25 to 35 minutes, or until heated through
